It represents physical power, hardness, muscle and all that.

Health and fitness of the character. Resistance to physical adversities.
Intelecto, voluntad y sabiduría son los ámbitos cubiertos por la Mente.
The overall appearance, attractiveness and charm.
Strength: Agility: Perception: Constitution: Inteligence: Charisma: Character image Character avatar I agree and accept the legal conditions Accept Yes Name Return Next Game as player Enter Delete Save Your characters Your games will be shown here when you add any About Legal Conditions RolAppeame is an application developed by: G. Samantha Guerrero Macías. GSam on GitHub.\nThe application is designed to easily and quickly annotate your character\'s statistics in a role-playing game. At the same time it offers you information about the different options of the game and its lore By accepting the conditions contained herein, you authorize G. Samantha Guerrero to collect information about the application. Its performance, its use and its errors, if any..
